summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BRICK AI Caseworker MVP. Backend APIs are 100% functional (16/16 tests passed). Frontend is 85% functional with critical AI chat display issue due to React Markdown component error. Core authentication, navigation, and data loading work correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Switching back from Register to Login tab doesn't properly hide Register form

integration_issues.issue: React Markdown component error prevents AI responses from displaying. Console shows 'Unexpected className prop' error
Login sometimes fails with timeout, may be authentication timing issue

passed_tests: Landing page Wizard of Oz theme display
Resources Map with Las Vegas data (6 resources)
Legal Aid page with forms (4 forms)
BRICK AI chat message sending (backend works)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix React Markdown component error in AI chat responses. The error 'Unexpected className prop' prevents users from seeing BRICK AI responses. Also fix minor tab switching issue between Login/Register forms.
